query: SELECT id, chapterNumber, title, LEFT(audioUrlPt, 100) as audioUrlPt FROM book_chapters WHERE audioUrlPt IS NOT NULL ORDER BY chapterNumber;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4S4NaSTm8gULMAn.ab4bddc10a61 --database fsRnWghWhaoD2r3KXXoRti --execute SELECT id, chapterNumber, title, LEFT(audioUrlPt, 100) as audioUrlPt FROM book_chapters WHERE audioUrlPt IS NOT NULL ORDER BY chapterNumber;
